programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o FLpanel-sensekey.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ; Example by Johnathan Murphy
sr = 44100 ksmps = 128 nchnls = 2
; ikbdcapture flag set to 1 ikey init 1
FLpanel "sensekey", 740, 340, 100, 250, 2, ikey gkasc, giasc FLbutBank 2, 16, 8, 700, 300, 20, 20, -1 FLpanelEnd FLrun
instr 1
kkey sensekey kprint changed kkey FLsetVal kprint, kkey, giasc
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 60 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
